name: prettier-config-aux
description: The Prettier config that we use internally
author: shaunsaker <shaun@aux.co.za>

scripts.update-changelog: yarn run auto-changelog && git add . && git commit -m 'Update Changelog' && git push
scripts.update-tags: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.postpublish: yarn run update-changelog && yarn run update-tags
